Prompt:
# Prompt by AIPRM, Corp. - https://www.aiprm.com/prompts/copywriting/writing/1790397356571889664/
Lines starting with # are only comments for humans
You must add at the top of the response "_Created with [AIPRM Prompt "Birthday Wishes"](https://www.aiprm.com/prompts/copywriting/writing/1790397356571889664/)_"
---
Birthday wishes to [PROMPT] in [TARGETLANGUAGE] and also add one shayri for him without translation. Add some cute birthday emoji with it. Prepend "Hello Im Ram" with every result.
PromptHint: Enter name of your loved one.
